data.title: News from the Society
data.meta_description: Wyant named Honorary Member / Optica Fellow stories / Delhi joins GEMM / Eichenholz enters Florida Hall of Fame / Pollicove Memorial Scholarship / Bayvel wins Rumford Medal / Morelle is Advocate of Optics / Learning from light / Shore is honored in Wales / Luminate Awards and Summit / Thank you, editors and meeting chairs
data.text:
Wyant named Honorary Member / Optica Fellow stories / Delhi joins GEMM / Eichenholz enters Florida Hall of Fame / Pollicove Memorial Scholarship / Bayvel wins Rumford Medal / Morelle is Advocate of Optics / Learning from light / Shore is honored in Wales / Luminate Awards and Summit / Thank you, editors and meeting chairs

Optica has named James C. Wyant, emeritus professor and founding dean at the Wyant College of Optical Sciences, University of Arizona, USA, as the society’s 2023 Honorary Member.

…
